revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:

|brand = ClockworkPi |model = DevTerm Kit |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A-06 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = SoM, single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3399; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_cores2 = 4 |cpu1_total_cores = 6 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A72 |cpu1_type2 = ARM |cpu1_type2_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz <!-- 1.4 / 2.0 GHz --> |cpu1spd2 = 1.4 GHz<!-- 1.4 / 2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = MicroSD Card |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SanDisk;; |flash1size = 32 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = STMicro;STM32F103;onchip; |flash2size = 512 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

|eth_none = true |oui = D4:9C:DD
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2022.04;-armbian; |stockos = Linux;5.10.60;Ubuntu 22.04;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot, Micro HDMI |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = USB Female (Type-C)
|serial = yes,, USB Female (Type-C),, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Micro HDMI, IPS Display, Bluetooth 5, Audio in/out (3.5mm), Li-Ion battery, fan, printer, GPIO |addchip = USB To Serial Interface;WCH;CH340G;;1;,,, 3W Mono Class-D Audio Amplifier;Awnic Tech;AW8110;;2;,,, 4-Port USB 2.0 Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, Single-Cell Li-Battery and Power System Management IC;X-Powers;AXP228;;1;,,, White LED Driver w/ Digital and PWM Brightness Control;Orient-Chip;OCP8178;;1;,,, 15A Synchronous Step Up Regulator w/ Accurate Output Current Limit;Silergy;SY7215;;1;,,, 5.5V 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;3;,,, I2C Compatible 10-Bit Analog-to-Digital Converter;TI;ADC101C;;1;,,, 800ma Low Dropout Linear Regulator;National Semi;LM1117;;1;,,, Dual H-Bridge Motor Driver;Princeton Tech;PT5139;;1;,,, Dual SPDT Analog Switch;Will Semi;WAS4729QB;;1;,,, TinyLogic UHS Dual Buffer;ON Semi;NC7WZ16;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = cpi |defaultpass = cpi |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 09/2021 |estprice = 339 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = SparkLAN AP6256 |rad1modif = SDIO 3.0 |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43456; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "clockwork", "CORE" and "A-06" are silkscreened on core module top. :"clockwork", "MAIN", "clockworkpi.com", "CPI 3.14", and "V4" :are silkscreened on mainboard.
Makes use of the [[ClockworkPi Core A-06]] SoM
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3399 @1.8GHz :Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A72) + :Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.4GHz *GPU: ''Mali-T864'' (OpenGL ES3.1, OpenVG 1.1, OpenCL, DX11, AFBC) :VPU (with 4K VP9 and 4K 10-bit H265/H264 decoding) *MCU: [[STMicro]] STM32F103 @72MHz :ARM (Cortex-M3) - used to control keyboard *Storage: TF card (max.1TB)/MMC card *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Broadcom]] BCM43456 :1x1 MIMO 802.11abgn+ac 2.4/5GHz + BT 5.0 *USB: 3x USB 2.0 ports, 1x USB Type-C charging port *Power Source: 3.7V via 2x 18650 batteries :or 5V/3A via USB Type-C
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/11/26/devterm-with-clockworkpi-v3-14-a-modular-portable-computer/ ''DevTerm with ClockworkPi v3.14: a modular, portable computer'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://www.hackster.io/news/clockwork-pi-devterm-review-hands-on-with-the-ultra-compact-trs-80-inspired-kit-computer-b5a73acbaefd ''Clockwork Pi DevTerm Review'' on '''hackster.io''']
